publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-366 Linda Fabiani: Scottish Traditional Music Awards-That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of the annual Scottish traditional music awards; congratulates all winners at the inaugural event which took place on 13 September 2003 in Edinburgh; notes in particular the posthumous award to Hamish Henderson for his outstanding contribution to Scottish culture, and appreciates the attendance of the Minister for Tourism, Culture and Sport at this important celebration of contemporary Scottish music. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Mr Rob Gibson*, Colin Fox*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Michael Matheson*, Brian Adam*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Jim Mather*

S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Mark Ballard*, Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine May*, Stewart Stevenson*, Robin Harper*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Nora Radcliffe*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Mr Bruce McFee*, Alex Neil*, Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-366 Scottish Traditional Music Awards (lodged on 19 September 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*
